'''Janryumon''' is an application featuring [[Japanese mahjong]].  The game is available as an app via Android and iPhone systems.

==End of service==
On January 10th, 2014, the online service to Janryumon has been discontinued.<ref>https://www.reddit.com/r/Mahjong/comments/1u6suo/popular_mahjong_mobile_app_janryumon_to_be/</ref>
